channel.title: Npc data [317]
channel.description:
Alright, here me out. Most, if not all, 317s load npc data using npc.cfg (for their actual data) and some form of an auto-spawn.cfg to spawn the npc's. What I'd like to do, with help from the community, is get mob spawn data, and their stat dats to put in the corresponding files. The idea is to get the most realistic spawns in runescape. I understand that there have been a few released, but lets actually get a completed one. Slayer spawns, height, etc. This http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Slayer_assignment can be helpful for us to get the correct slayer spawns, but obviously there's more to this than that, gwd (for servers applicable), other boss locations, wildy revs, lumbridge, draynor, etc all need done. Comment if you'd like to help. or flame, I don't really care.
I actually want to make a world based server, not a command based one, and this would be one of the ways to bring that abroad.

item.title: Npc data [317]
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

find me a old npc spawn list that you want to use.

preferably only npc id and name, but if you can’t trim it ill trim it myself and make a “location dumper” and you can change the string to coords.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc data [317]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:5, topic:529257”]get a list of all old npcs.

http://www.global-rs.com/database/monsters/

parse them in that.

dump all data including location (as a string)

create a table of all string locations vs the coords for them (this is pretty much the only part that cannot be automated

reiterate through dumped data and change the string location to the proper ints.
remember this will be randomized for spawn + walking distanced[/quote]
I did not know that site existed, also, I don’t know web related shit like dumping data :s sorry.
Feel like helping me? <3 Just help me with the script. I’m sure I can get going from there

Read full topic

item.title: Npc data [317]
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

get a list of all old npcs.

http://www.global-rs.com/database/monsters/

parse them in that.

dump all data including location (as a string)

create a table of all string locations vs the coords for them (this is pretty much the only part that cannot be automated

reiterate through dumped data and change the string location to the proper ints.
remember this will be randomized for spawn + walking distanced

Read full topic

item.title: Npc data [317]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:2, topic:529257”]because its so hard to parse a website an get the data yourself?
download one that’s been released and fix it up with what is missing.[/quote]
As we’ve discussed before. The site’s don’t have data for older runescape. So there’d be a lot of bad data. Plus, I’d have to write out all the coords, which is 90% of the task.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc data [317]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Alright, here me out.
Most, if not all, 317s load npc data using npc.cfg (for their actual data) and some form of an auto-spawn.cfg to spawn the npc’s.
What I’d like to do, with help from the community, is get mob spawn data, and their stat dats to put in the corresponding files. The idea is to get the most realistic spawns in runescape. I understand that there have been a few released, but lets actually get a completed one. Slayer spawns, height, etc.
This http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Slayer_assignment can be helpful for us to get the correct slayer spawns, but obviously there’s more to this than that, gwd (for servers applicable), other boss locations, wildy revs, lumbridge, draynor, etc all need done.
Comment if you’d like to help. or flame, I don’t really care.

I actually want to make a world based server, not a command based one, and this would be one of the ways to bring that abroad.

Read full topic
